step.description: Maps locations, record identifier type for RPI
step.name: Library codes, RPI
step.script:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:output indent="yes" method="xml" version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"/> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@* | node()"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<!-- Map legacy code for the library/institution to a FOLIO resource identifier type UUID. Used for qualifying a local record identifier with the library it originated from in context of a shared index setup where the Instance represents bib records from multiple libraries. --> <xsl:template match="//identifierTypeIdHere"> <identifierTypeId>b7438196-7007-57a5-be7a-343afb42c214</identifierTypeId> </xsl:template>
<!-- Map legacy location code to a FOLIO location UUID --> <xsl:variable name="apos">'</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="//permanentLocationIdHere"> <permanentLocationId> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA Beranek Collection'">aee6abb4-717b-5614-86dd-18d93a13bf64</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA Book Stacks'">2de87e91-2eee-5c9a-8eb3-40dd19ef6ac8</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA CDROM'">84dd237a-78c1-51ee-9901-aa34584c2c4f</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA DVD'">e21f13cd-3795-53e6-9931-31642123b527</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA Outsize'">51343ca7-9948-5325-8697-d08aecbd5f5d</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA Video'">9c4eba2c-3cff-5c41-8758-406b011c2f11</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA Billed'">4c33dc66-7f0a-5039-b7cd-7dc84781b8ad</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA Course Reserve'">1335dd84-de46-5b71-8586-8e7820cb5940</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA Course Reserve Overnight'">c2d75a59-8dff-5cf7-87ba-d273feedefc5</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA In Process'">85aefd60-f010-5725-99af-0f173b8918c5</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA Journal Stacks'">00a479be-e249-500b-9568-0fcb14cc6d3d</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA Microform'">27dcdd26-9f79-5439-822c-6daba3390790</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA Outsize Library-Use Only'">13fe880d-3ec8-58d3-b384-d96c944649c3</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA Reference'">3b90693a-22b2-5080-a89a-3f2659c5998b</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA Reference Reserve'">862342f7-9eb4-5e1b-a9c3-0038b7b2475f</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA Reserve Overnight'">7fed35fb-4167-541b-9885-271bb413badc</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMA Special Thesis'">637729af-1a23-5556-be56-676309a0992f</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="starts-with(., 'YRMA')">6de37a75-d5cb-5948-a378-95bd9b869654</xsl:when> <!-- Unmapped (YRMA)--> <xsl:when test=".='YRMM Book Stacks'">1b4192b6-b6e9-57aa-884d-cc5f016b86a9</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMM CD (1st Floor)'">fd5cdca5-846d-507b-b6b6-662c690085b8</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMM CDROM (1st Floor)'">b96d9d3c-fc00-584c-a502-45504900dc80</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMM DVD (2nd Floor)'">a3dc4031-928c-5dd4-a155-37657c846721</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMM Microform'">6e3c77d3-cb2e-55fd-b6ac-efc76444571e</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMM Outsize'">9eae5bfd-7596-53dd-8264-8b3e891fd380</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMM Phonorecord (1st Floor)'">cdcef31b-f6f6-5b0f-aac8-01688f3bdc9d</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMM Technical Reports (3rd Floor)'">27bb6508-f702-5de6-bf74-b104a76af6fd</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMM Thesis Hartford Thesis CDROM Storage (Service Desk)'">55c37f26-fc96-53e4-bbf5-1d230f27b5b6</xsl:when> <xsl:when test=".='YRMM In Process'">66efe282-883b-5666-ad04-7252d6c35900</xsl:when> <xsl:when <!-- Set FOLIO Inventory ID for the institution --> <xsl:template match="//institutionIdHere"> <institutionId>4ce715e2-c336-52db-9519-86279e3edb8a</institutionId> </xsl:template>
